alert.note: Alert for Quitman; Randolph (Georgia) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued May 22 at 1:44PM EDT until May 22 at 2:30PM EDT by NWS Tallahassee
info.description: The National Weather Service in Tallahassee has issued a * Severe Thunderstorm Warning for... Northwestern Randolph County in southwestern Georgia... Quitman County in southwestern Georgia... * Until 230 PM EDT. * At 144 PM EDT, severe thunderstorms were located along a line extending from 6 miles east of Lakepoint Resort State Park to 11 miles south of Lumpkin to near Cuthbert, moving northeast at 40 mph. HAZARD...60 mph wind gusts and penny size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Expect damage to roofs, siding, and trees. * Locations impacted include... Georgetown, Springvale Station, Wire Bridge, Hatcher, Morris, Peterson Hill, Coles, Crossroads and Springvale. HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...0.75 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building.
